column1: Renens (French pronunciation: ​[ʁə.n̪ɑ̃] pronunciation) is a municipality in the canton of Vaud
column2: Switzerland. It is located in the district of Ouest Lausannois
column3: and is a suburb of the city of Lausanne. It is the fourth largest city in the canton. It is considered a very multiethnic town
column4: as more than 50% of the inhabitants are resident foreign nationals from about a hundred different countries.
